changelog:
Update 1.0.4:
- Multiplayer: Fixed critical LAN crash (StackOverflow bug).
- Graphics: New professional hit system with localized Pinch effects.
- Visuals: Integrated dynamic Post-Processing (Bloom/Saturation pulses).
- UI: Fixed broken Main Menu buttons and improved intro sequences.
- Updater: Added seamless Batch-restart for game updates.
